= `zod-validation-error`
:toc: left
// :url-website: 
// :url-docs:

// {url-website}[[website\]]
// {url-docs}[[docs\]]
{url-repo}[[repo\]]

== Installation

[,bash]
----
pnpm install zod-validation-error
----

== Usage

[,javascript]
----
import { fromZodError } from 'zod-validation-error';

console.log(fromZodError(...));
----
